features: 16.5" - 20" inch Adjustable Height Make Up Mirror: Height adjustable makeup mirror (16.5 to 20 inches adjustment), no need to bend over makeup. Suitable for people of different heights and table of different heights

5000mAh Rechargeable Cordless Vanity Mirror: Our tabletop makeup mirror with lights is built in 5000mAh rechargeable Lithium battery, work for more than 12 hours after fully charged, half hours of daily usage, 15 Days of Battery Life. And the mirror has a 30 mins Auto Light-off Feature to save energy when you forget to turn off the light

8.6 Inch 1X/10X Double-sided Magnifying Mirror: The diameter of the mirror is 8.6 inches wide, which is larger and more capable of shining on your beauty! And the lighted 1x mirror for overall makeup and skincare. 10x Magnifying mirror with lights for close up details like plunking eye browns, popping acne, wearing contact lenses

Dimmable 3 Lighting Colors: This lighted mirror built-in 60 LEDs with Dimmable 3 Color modes. Warm Light,Cold Light and Nature Light. Light is more natural, softer, brighter, warmer, cooler in tone. Create ideal lighting conditions for makeup application with Our lighted vanity mirrors

Best Beauty Gifts for Women: The magnifying mirror is very suitable for Christmas, New Year, Valentine's Day, Mother's Day and other holiday as a gift to your mother, sister, wife, girlfriend, etc. Your lovers can use beauty mirror to keep stunning anytime

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can’t imagine my life without it anymore
reviews.reviewText: This makeup mirror is simply amazing! It’s chargeable and holds it for quite a long time. I charged it a month ago - still works! I love that its height is adjustable and that it has three different light options. I saw similar mirror in store for over $70. This one is just a perfect value and it’s so affordable. The only thing I still can’t figure out is how to understand when I need to charge it next time (except for waiting and seeing when it won’t switch on).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it, love it, love it!!!
reviews.reviewText: If you're considering this one, get it! Very well made, easy to use and I love the fact that it's adjustable. My old one was way too short and had to lean over to use. This one is perfect height, heavy, sturdy base and easy to see in. It has a shut off feature so in case you forget to turn it off, it will shut it's self off, which is cool. It comes with a charging cord, but no plug, so that was a minus, but with all the old phone plugs I had, not a pain of having to buy one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great lighted magnifying mirror
reviews.reviewText: Love that the height is adjustable and love the size of the mirror. Holds a charge and is easy to useThe only reason I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars is because the 10 x magnification is really a lot. You have to be very close to the mirror for your image to be focused

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: Haven’t purchased a makeup mirror in years, so was unsure of all the upgrades on the market. This is a quality mirror with easy adjustable lighting. Flip side is 10x and easy to focus on. Stays lighted for 30 minutes and cuts itself off. For me, that’s a great feature. Easy to charge when needed. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this!
reviews.reviewText: Not only is this mirror sturdy and the different light settings are really nice but the fact that the height is adjustable is what made me buy it. No more hunching over when I sit in front of it to tweeze my eyebrows. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for my counter top
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect countertop mirror for several reasons. It is height adjustable so I no longer have to put my makeup mirror on a box of Kleenex to get a good angle. It is nicely weighted and looks pretty. The 10x magnification is just what I need for applying makeup, no distortion. The LED light has several temperature settings and starts out exactly where I want it to be saving me from having to cycle through the options. The rechargeable battery keeps my lighted mirror glowing without having to plug it in. This is a winner for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So happy with this vanity mirror. It is large enough for full face makeup application. And the adjustable height is exactly what I needed to avoid constantly bending down. Looks great on my bathroom counter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The part that adjusts the height of the unit does not hold snugly, so the unit slides down... :(
reviews.reviewText: I love that I don't have another cord dangling in my bathroom. I appreciate that I can simply charge the unit; however, I bought this particular product because of the adjustable base. I am very tall, so the ability to extend the unit was very appealing. Unfortunately, it does not hold well, and the unit will slide down and retract to the base. The illumination is good and the quality of the mirror is good, but the QC of the adjustable base needs work.
